explains: n. 调度员；[计] 调度程序；[计] 分配器

sentences.en: The police dispatcher received the call at around 10:30 a.m.
sentences.cn: 警察局的调度员在早上十点半左右接到电话。

sentences.en: Is Liang Ruimei a dispatcher in Emergency Center of Jinzhong?
sentences.cn: 梁瑞梅是晋中急救中心的调度员吗？

sentences.en: "A dispatcher's job is counted in seconds," says Liang Ruimei, a dispatcher in the center.
sentences.cn: “调度员的工作是以秒为单位计算的。”中心的调度员梁瑞梅说。
